SubstanceDataDesc Struct Reference

Substance cooked data description structure definition. More...

#include <datadesc.h>

Data Fields

  • unsigned int outputsCount
  • unsigned int inputsCount

Detailed Description

Substance cooked data description structure definition.

Filled using the substanceHandleGetDesc function declared in handle.h.

Field Documentation

unsigned int SubstanceDataDesc::outputsCount

Number of outputs (texture results).

unsigned int SubstanceDataDesc::inputsCount

Number of inputs (render parameters).

unsigned char SubstanceDataDesc::platformId

Identifier of the platform the data was cooked for.

unsigned char SubstanceDataDesc::formatVersion

Format version the data was cooked for.
